A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I want you to know that I am a liberal\, progressive\, socialist and I hate this film!  It ruins the STAR WARS franchise by completely mishandling the character of Luke Skywalker.  Luke Skywalker would not have tried to kill Han and Leia's child in his sleep.  Luke Skywalker is my childhood hero (as far as movies go).  He wouldn't even have been on that island!  He would have been right next to his sister and Han who would have all never given up!\n\nThis film is a failure and a disappointment and it is important for you to know that the reason for my hatred is not sexism.  I have always welcomed women and minorities in movies.  Have a nice day!
